input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Trophy 1st Note Kazoo

Item specifications:
Comes in Red or Blue
Made of Durable Plastic
Hum Your Favorite Tunes
Real Instrument

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Introducing the all-new Kazoo 1st Note Trophy! This kazoo has been designed with a built-in microphone and speaker, allowing you to play your favorite tunes anywhere you go! It comes in two vibrant colors - red and blue, giving you the freedom to choose the one that best suits your style. Made of durable plastic, this kazoo is built to last and can withstand rough handling. The microphone and speaker are powered by a single AAA battery which is easily replaceable. Just hum your favorite tunes and the kazoo will amplify your voice, making it the perfect choice for any occasion!
input_text.Response B: If you're looking for a fun and unique way to play your favorite tunes, look no further than the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo! This real instrument is made of durable plastic and comes in red or blue. So whether you're a seasoned musician or just starting out, the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo is sure to bring a little joy to your music-making.
